remarks: A homomorphism of monoids preserves group multiples.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
statement:
mhmmulg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mhmmulg.s $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mhmmulg.t $e |- .X. = ( .g ` H ) $.
mhmmulg $p |- ( ( F e. ( G MndHom H ) /\ N e. NN0 /\ X e. B ) -> ( F ` ( N .x. X ) ) = ( N .X. ( F ` X ) ) ) $.
